ref.title: Solubility and Excess Molar Properties of 1,3-Dimethylimidazolium Methylsulfate, or 1-Butyl-3-Methylimidazolium Methylsulfate, or 1-Butyl-3-Methylimidazolium Octylsulfate Ionic Liquids with n-Alkanes and Alcohols: Analysis in Terms of the PFP and FBT Models
ref.full: Domanska, U.; Pobudkowska, A.; Wisniewska, A. (2006) J. Solution Chem. 35(3), 311-334.
